text_blocks.content:
Instruction No. 41: Time of Offense
The Indictment alleges that certain conduct occurred on or about various dates or during
various time periods. It is not necessary, however, for the Government to prove that any conduct
alleged occurred exactly on such dates or throughout any such time periods. As long as the
conduct occurred around any dates or within any time periods the Indictment alleges it occurred,
that is sufficient.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to a criminal case. The text is clear and legible, with no visible redactions or damage.
